thread.title: BRIEF-Williams And Williams Partners Respond To FERC Income Tax Policy Revision

title: BRIEF-Williams And Williams Partners Respond To FERC Income Tax Policy Revision
text: 40 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Williams And Williams Partners Respond To FERC Income Tax Policy Revision Reuters Staff   Williams Partners Lp: * WILLIAMS AND WILLIAMS PARTNERS STATEMENT ON FERC INCOME TAX POLICY REVISION * WILLIAMS COMPANIES INC - FERC’S REVISED POLICY WILL ONLY IMPACT COST OF SERVICE RATE CALCULATIONS ON A PROSPECTIVE BASIS * WILLIAMS COMPANIES INC - ‍TRANSCO WILL MAKE ITS INITIAL FILING FOR ITS NEXT RATE CASE LATER THIS YEAR​ * WILLIAMS COMPANIES INC - ‍NEGOTIATED RATES WILL MAKE UP ABOUT 50 PERCENT OF TRANSCO’S REVENUE BY YEAR-END AND WOULD NOT BE IMPACTED BY RULING​ * WILLIAMS COMPANIES INC - ‍GULFSTREAM NATURAL GAS SYSTEM’S RATES WITH CUSTOMERS, WHICH ARE ALL NEGOTIATED RATES, WOULD NOT BE IMPACTED BY RULING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
